name: Alternate Watch
description:
A Mandela Catalogue themed I'm on Observation Duty type game.

This project was started in February of 2022 and worked on inconsistently till May 2022.

Due to my current financial and home life situation it is not viable for me to work on this anymore but it would be a waste to not release it in some form so here it is.

This game supports Lumen Global Illumination and can be expensive to run so try disabling it in the settings menu if you have performance issues.

Anomaly Types:

Imagery - Paintings and Pictures Changing

Displacement - Object Changing Location

Mimic - Duplicate Object

Flawed (Alternate) - Flawed Impersonator (Distorted Human Alternate)

Unspeakable - This is not in the game

Intruder - Cloaked Figure Obscured and Whispering

Electrical - Televisions, Lights, Radios

Tulpa - Seen only in Mirrors

Corpse - This is not in the game

Unknown - Cannot be classified
